solution_line_template: If Giselle had {initial_doves} doves that laid {eggs_per_dove} eggs each, the total number of eggs in the birdhouse is {initial_doves}*{eggs_per_dove} = <<{initial_doves}*{eggs_per_dove}={total_eggs}>>{total_eggs} eggs.
If {hatch_fraction} of the eggs hatched into birds, their total number is {hatch_fraction}*{total_eggs} = <<{hatch_fraction}*{total_eggs}={hatched_birds}>>{hatched_birds}
In the birdhouse, there are {initial_doves} initial doves + {hatched_birds} new squabs = <<{initial_doves}+{hatched_birds}={total_doves}>>{total_doves} birds
